title: How to ace the blazer dress trend
text: Ditch your pants. No seriously, ditch them, just like Priyanka Chopra Jonas did. The next time you want to wear a blazer you don’t necessarily need a pair of pants. Take cue from these celebrities on how to work the blazer dress trend, sans the trousers. A hybrid silhouette between a dress and a blazer is all you need the next time you must shuffle between work meetings and date nights. This new form of power dressing is chic with an understated glamour etched to it.No prize for guessing the actor on the forefront of this trend, of course, it’s Priyanka Chopra Jonas. Whether she’s jet-setting across the globe or walking her dog Diana on the streets of New York, the global dominator is often seen sporting the blazer dress. Shibani Dandekar and Monica Dogra, the official founders of the cool girl club, have also worked this trend on the red carpet. Here’s a list of celebrities who have abandoned the pants for good.
description: Priyanka Chopra, Kendall Jenner and Shibani Dandekar serving all the inspiration you need to work the blazer dress trend.
